QueryResult.text: select evm_period_defs.id odf_pk, EVM_PERIOD_DEFS.ID as ev_rpt_period_key, evm_period_defs.CODE as ev_rpt_period_id, evm_period_defs.NAME as ev_rpt_period, evm_period_defs.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, EVM_PERIOD_DEFS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as clarity_updated_date from evm_period_defs evm_period_defs where 1 = 1
